entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 30
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 50
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
WINDY WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
BREEZY WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
